In England, in the seven days to 05 April, there were 16,936 new confirmed cases (30.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 29 March, there were 27,909 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 39% (10,973 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 10 April is 3,817,811 (6,782.8 cases per 100,000 population).
